import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; // Add this import export default function Biryanis({ biryani }) { if (!biryani || !biryani.name) { return null; // or some fallback UI if biryani is undefined or has no name } const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1); const [varient, setVarient] = useState('small'); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return (

{biryani.name}

Varients

Quantity

Price: {biryani.prices[0][varient] * quantity} Rs/-

{biryani.name}

{biryani.description}
); }
